data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

data.author: John Wooden
data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.

data.author: Arthur Ashe
data.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

data.author: Jimi Hendrix
data.quote: Music doesn’t lie. If there is something to be changed in this world, then it can only happen through music.

data.author: Eric Clapton
data.quote: When all the original blues guys are gone, you start to realize that someone has to tend to the tradition. I recognize that I have some responsibility to keep the music alive, and it’s a pretty honorable position to be in.

data.author: B.B. King
data.quote: A guitar is like an old friend that is there with me.

data.author: Leonard Bernstein
data.quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed; a plan, and not quite enough time.

data.author: Gustav Mahler
data.quote: I am hitting my head against the walls, but the walls are giving way.

data.author: John Cage
data.quote: I can't understand why people are frightened of new ideas. I'm frightened of the old ones.

data.author: Richard Wagner
data.quote: Imagination creates reality.

data.author: Patti Smith
data.quote: Please, no matter how we advance technologically, please don't abandon the book. There is nothing in our material world more beautiful than the book.

data.author: Jimi Hendrix
data.quote: Music is my religion.

data.author: Heraclitus
data.quote: There is nothing permanent except change.

data.author: Democritus
data.quote: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is just opinion.

data.author: Michael Jordan
data.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.

data.author: Mother Teresa
data.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to'.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
